name: Jam Runner
description:
This is a project that my sons (ages 6 and 9) did over a weekend.  With COVID and the extreme weather we decided to stay in this weekend and put together a game in a "game jam" type format (2 days to complete the game).  The boys did all of the art for the game and the sound/music we used an online sound effect generator.  We used Godot as the game engine which was a learning experience for me.  This is "completed" for now and is far from a completed project.  Our goal was to get a fully working game by the end of the weekend with all the elements you would expect in a game.  It was a great learning experience for both me and the boys.  Enjoy!

Change Log:

v1.1

Fixed a bug where you could queue up multiple jumps
